cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 50 miles north of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest over the southeastern Gulf of Mexico then turning northwest toward the Texas–Louisiana coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Texas–Louisiana border, close to Lake Charles LA / Port Arthur TX

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge and Hurricane watches limited to the Texas–Louisiana Gulf Coast (San Luis Pass TX to Ocean Springs MS)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warnings confined to western Cuba and Lower Florida Keys
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern and north-western Gulf Coast from Texas to Mississippi
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: ANNAPOLIS MD (closest listed point in probability table; none available for Ohio)
weather_observation.wind: Only remnant breezes expected; below tropical-storm force
weather_observation.storm_surge: None (inland freshwater port on Lake Erie)
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to moderate rainfall possible with remnants, generally less than 2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would materially affect port operations
